data.content: The hall is full of people, everyone looks dignified, seems to see the real image but tries to convince themselves, what is wrong.
The judge is still serious and looks at everyone, as if he saw all the real images in his eyes.
"You claim that you have witnessed the fact that the defendant killed the victim, is that true?"
The lawyer asked with a serious look.
"Yes." The witness answered calmly.
“How far is the location of the murderer from the location where you witnessed it?”
"I think there are probably five or six houses that are so far away."
"This is what you visually see."
"Of course."
"You said that there are five or six that far away. Where did you look at it? Is it from the position of the lantern on the road, or from the direction of the tea shop?"
"It was seen from the direction of the tea shop."
"Where is it in the tea shop? Is it the shadow of the tree in front of the tea shop, or the shadow of the curtain?"
"I saw it in the shadow of the curtain."
At this time, the lawyer quickly flipped two or three records on the table while focusing the line of sight on one point.
"You were sitting in the chair there, are you?"
"Yes."
"You are sure that you were sitting in a chair there, right?"
"Yes, I am sure."
"But you can actually sit there and watch the whole tragedy happen. It’s really weird! Is the witness not standing up?"
"In the middle I stood up."
"Is it from the time the defendant gave the victim a fatal blow?"
"Is such that."
"In terms of time, how long does the witness appear from the chair sitting in the tea shop, the victim appeared?"
"It’s about ten minutes."
"The one who passed by at the very beginning is of course the victim Morita Yoshihide."
"Yes."
"How do you know that that person is Morita Yoshihide?"
"It is judged from the body type."
"In this way, that is to say, the witness knows that the person passing by is Morita Yoshihide."
"Yes, I judged from his figure."
"Sumida is entering the yard of the Tokiwa Shrine from the west, going to the east, is this the case?"
"I think so."
"When Morita walked to the left and right of the tea shop, did he stop?"
"No, he hasn't stopped at all."
"It is very quick to go over."
"Yes, he walked quickly."
"Will the witness say hello to him at that time?"
"No, I didn't say hello to him, there was no time."
"Which direction does Yinji come from?"
"He came out from the shadow of the long lamp."
"How do you know that the sound is coming out of the shadow of the lantern?"
"Because I saw him coming out from behind the lantern."
"But, from the front of your tea shop, the location of the murder and the location of the lantern are completely opposite."
"Assuming you are looking at the direction of Morita Yusei, how can you see the sound coming out of the shadow of the lantern?"
"You are right, I couldn't see it. But because there was a black thing moving in the shadow of the lantern, it quickly caught my attention."
"That person is a sound guitar, is it?"
"Yes."
"How do you know that the person is a sound?"
"It was seen by the light of the long lamp."
"Have you seen his face?"
"Yes, I saw it."
"Is it immediately after coming out from the back of the lantern?"
"Yes."
"But the wick of the long lamp is located up to nine feet above. Did you see it right away?"
"Maybe I saw it after a little distance."
"When did you sit in the chair of the tea shop?"
"At eleven o'clock."
"Is it at eleven?"
"No, it's probably close to eleven."
“Is this the time you look at the watch?”
"Yes, I sat in the chair and took the time to look at the time."
"The time is a very important point for the defendant. Is your watch accurate?"
"My watch is very accurate. There is absolutely no problem at this time."
"What did you do after sitting in the chair of the tea shop?"
"I did nothing."
"You take the time to see the time, aren't you?"
"This is the same as I said before."
"what's next?"
"Next I ordered a cigarette."
"It goes without saying that you must use a match to light a cigarette, is it?"
"Yes."
The midway lawyer turned his face to the jury to explain:

"The defendant Yin Ji has already admitted in the police station and the procuratorate that he has been hiding in the shadow of the lantern. According to the investigation, he has been hiding in the shadow of the lantern for more than 20 minutes.
In order not to miss Morita’s whereabouts, he claimed that he had been looking at the road in front of the tea shop.
Since the witness has been wiping the match with cigarettes, the defendant must have noticed it.
In this way, the defendant will naturally find someone at the tea shop. But can you commit a crime if you know someone?
At this time, the lawyer turned his face to the witness and asked:

"When the witness said that the defendant had come out of the testimony of the long light, can you confirm that it is accurate? Isn't Yinji not following Morita's arrival? Please think carefully and answer."
"He did come out from behind the lantern. Maybe he trailed behind Morita and then hid behind the lantern."
"But if Morita is rushing over, then the defendant has no need to hide behind the long light, isn't it?"
"Yes. I think so. Maybe he has been hiding behind the lanterns. Maybe he didn't notice that I smoked!"
"In short, the defendant did come out from behind the lantern, isn't it?"
"Yes, I'm sure."
"The defendant ran out from behind the lantern, and waved the axe in the back of Morita, and slammed it against Morita's head.
"is it?"
"Yes."
"How do you know that it is an axe?"
"I saw it when he was waving."
"Is it by the light of a long lamp?"
"When the sound of the axe was cut down, what did you say?"
"I remember that he said the word "I" and then cut it down."
"What did Morita say?"
"He didn't say anything. I just remembered hearing that he had made some low-pitched "hmm" buzz."
"After the first hit, Morita fell down?"
"Yes."
"After Yinji fell down in Morita, did he slash the victim again?"
"I think he probably played two or three times."
"Where did he cut down Morita, who fell down?"
"Probably the chest and abdomen."
"How did Morita fall down?"
"It’s a slight slanting face and falling down."
"According to the autopsy of the forensic doctor, there is indeed a wound on the back of the deceased, but the victim is not lying there."
"He was struggling to become a prone after he fell down."
"Is Morita falling down with his bag?"
"Yes, he held the bag in his right hand and fell down."
"When he fell down, didn't he throw the bag out?"
"No, he is holding the bag down."
"How does Yinji handle the weapon's axe?"
"He stared at the axe for a moment, and slammed the axe to the side of the body."
"That said, it was Yinji who took the bag he was holding from the arms of Morita, right?"
"Yes, he took the bag from Morita's right hand."
"According to the accused's confession, Morita threw the bag out when he fell down. So the testimony that the witness just made is accurate?"
Yeah, accurate. He did fall down with the bag."
"Is that bag a black fold?"
"Yes."
"Is there a strap with a metal buckle attached to that bag?"
"Yean"
"Then the leather surface of the bag has been worn very old."
"Yes."
"How do you know what this bag looks like?"
"I saw it at the scene of the crime."
"You used to know that Morita has been carrying such a package!"
"Yes, I know that."
"So at the scene of the crime, you are not the first time to see this package?"
"Yes, I have seen it before."
The lawyer looked at the two or three sheets of paper on the table and asked: "Is the guitar tied with a scarf?"
"Tie it."
"What is it like? What color?"
"Looks like a red flannel scarf."
"Red, not brown?"
